name: Battles of Isonzo
description:
Fight on the side of the Austro-Hungarian troops to  win against the Italians on the Alpine front of the first World War. Lead your troops through the fierce terrain of the alps to gain an advantage against your enemy.

Moving the camera: Arrow-Keys, WASD-Keys

moving soldiers: mark them with mouse and point to target with the right mouse button

If you played this game any feedback would be really helpful and  greatly appreciated :)
